title: BUILDING
author: Brian McGee
body: BRM offers full replacement options for most household items. We install fencing, and decks. From repairs to major renovations and home remodeling we can handle all your homes needs.

title: REPAIRS
author: Brian McGee
body: BRM offers full replacement options for most household items. We install fencing, and decks. From repairs to major renovations and home remodeling we can handle all your homes needs.

title: MAINTENANCE
author: Brian McGee
body: Changing seasons bringing on a whole new list of maintenance items, BRM can help. We handle tasks like gutter cleaning, clean up and debris removal. Often simply maintenance can extend the service life.
